passage.text: The Main Hall is through that Server Coolant room round the corner,  \n it's secured with a blue key though
You'll have to find the blue key, open that door then go through to the main room. \n Once in there I just need you to press the red button and our safety check will be complete.
That's the spirit! \n I'll be here if you need me.
What are you afraid of? We haven't had a raid for 10 years kid. \n You'll be fine.
